description: Motivated Fullstack Developer with around 1 year of hands-on experience in web development using Node.js, Express, TypeScript, ReactJS, Redux, and MongoDB. Skilled in building responsive UIs, developing scalable RESTful APIs, and deploying fullstack applications.

projects.name: Vietnam Travel Website
projects.description: A fullstack travel booking platform with separate client and admin dashboards. Features secure authentication, RESTful APIs, and Redux state management.

projects.name: Plant Shop Website
projects.description: An SSR e-commerce platform for selling plants, built with the MVC model. Includes CRUD, Cloudinary image upload, middleware-based validation, authentication, and email notifications.

projects.name: Online Quiz Website
projects.description: A quiz platform with topic-based questions, scoring logic, history tracking, and detailed result analytics. Responsive UI built with Ant Design and SCSS.

projects.name: Pure HTML/CSS Website
projects.description: A frontend-only project focused on building responsive layouts and reusable UI components with clean, optimized code.
